column5: police moved in on a rented property in Toul Phum Village
column7: Khan Por Senchey. The police force of the fire station and the police force of Chom Chao 1 have cooperated closely by tracking down a stolen motorbike using GPS. 5 stolen bikes were recovered.------Prior to this collaboration
column8: the suspects were engaged in the theft of a 2015 model Honda Dream belonging to the fire brigade. ------Using a GPS tracker
column9: forces went to the rented room above
column10: where they found the victim’s motorcycle
